forum.name: Classroom Observation: Introducing Fractions, Decimals, and Percents
forum.intro:
In this activity, you will watch and discuss a video of an inquiry-based lesson in which adult learners are discussing the relationships between fractions, decimals, and percents.

  1. Watch the following video from PBS Learning Media. As you watch, consider the following:
    • How does the instructor elicit students’ experiences connected to rational numbers?
    • What else do you notice the instructor doing?
    • What additional strategies can instructors implement to help learners see relationships among different representations of numbers?

  2. Share your responses in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum.
  3. Read and respond to others’ postings. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.)
